extendedInfo.description: Elite Backup allows "Without Root Permission" backups of your tablet or smartphone to make. The backup backups are stored by date and time, and can be restored if necessary. Elite Backup allows you to back up your backup set and hidden data and store it on an external storage device.Important: Your backups are stored on your devices internal memory, mostly under (/mnt/storage/sdcard/backup/). Please save the backup data manually to an external storage device, or go over all your lost data from a device failure! The Elite Backup Pro version saves the backup data to external devices!Features:- Languages: German, Spanish, English (more to follow)- Select storage (intern / external storage devices / SD Card)- Number of backups set- Number of backup types set- Store the date and time- restore and Create of data backupsFind Hidden Data Backup and Backup -- NO ROOT requiredBackup securing:- SMS / MMS- Voicemail- Call register- Bookmark- Dictionaries- Playlists- Device Settings- Wifi Settings (Pro Version)- Contacts- Images- Calendar entries- Games and Apps (Beta)Have a question or a problem? Any errors found or may be a bit better? Then send us an email.Elite Backup - Pro Version: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.backup.titan
